channel.title: Z508 Video PvP Updates
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKK0i22ha0M
Pretty much have the closest thing to correct melee accuracy I have ever seen in a private server. It is determined by a 42 line algorythm, that returns a number from 0 to 1. The number is your chance to hit. For example, the algorythm returns 0.255, you have a 25.5% chance of hitting. The beauty of it, is that I can change the overall chance of hitting by modifying one number.
In the video, both players are maxed combat, the attacker drinks a strength potion and uses smite and piety.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZITgQ6QwFg
My 508, Z508, featuring nearly flawless melee PvP. I've not yet started range or mage, but this took me about 3-4 days to develope. We're wearing recoil rings in the video, which is why there's TONS of damage. Compare it to any newer RuneScape PK video, and you'll see not many changes.

item.title: Z508 Video PvP Updates
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

Zach 93:

It is determined by a 42 line algorythm

Mine for my server is… 4lines… And its only for melle and range … And mine sucks
float t=0;for(int i=6;i<=9;i++)t+=opcis.playerBonus[i];
t/=5;
t=(t>200)? (t*1.15)+100 : (t+100)1.05;
return ((int) (calculateMaxDam() ((85 - (misc.random(20) * t/100) + (misc.random(20) * 100/t))/100)));

Mine, actually increases max hit though, as there is a chance for the first random to be 0 and second random to be 20…
But mine does lower avg. hit; & 4% high max hit doesn’t mean much

Yes, Just Wondering, How do yours? i.e.
Do you first do damage Amount then subtract with defense?
Or do you start with Defense, and then add Damage?
I am only asking abroad question, It’s not like im asking for the math
And I do notice Your using 508, the code I showed is for 317… lol

~Happy Coding

Read full topic
